001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAnyGetter;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAnySetter;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
008import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
009
010import java.time.Instant;
011import java.util.HashMap;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Optional;
015
016// TODO: Merge/reconcile with WalletTransactionInfo
017// TODO: Consider making more record-like
018/**
019 * (Mostly) Immutable representation of BitcoinTransaction info JSON
020 * <p>
021 * It is not fully-immutable because of {@link #addOtherInfo(String, Object)} which should only be used by Jackson
022 * when deserializing.
023 * <p>
024 * This is returned by {@code BitcoinClient.listTransactions()}.
025 */
026public class BitcoinTransactionInfo {
027    private final boolean           involvesWatchOnly;
028    private final Address           address;
029    private final String            category;
030    private final Coin              amount;
031    private final String            label;
032    private final int               vout;
033    private final Coin              fee;
034    private final int               confirmations;
035    private final boolean           generated;
036    private final boolean           trusted;
037    private final Sha256Hash        blockHash;
038    private final int               blockHeight;
039    private final int               blockIndex;
040    private final Instant              blockTime;
041    private final Sha256Hash            txId;
042    private final List<Sha256Hash>      walletConflicts;
043    private final Instant               time;
044    private final Instant               timeReceived;
045    private final String                comment;
046    private final String                bip125Replaceable;
047    private final boolean               abandoned;
048    private final Map<String, Object>   otherInfo;
049
050    public BitcoinTransactionInfo(@JsonProperty("involvesWatchonly")    boolean     involvesWatchOnly,
051                                  @JsonProperty("address")              Address     address,
052                                  @JsonProperty("category")             String      category,
053                                  @JsonProperty("amount")               Coin        amount,
054                                  @JsonProperty("label")                String      label,
055                                  @JsonProperty("vout")                 int         vout,
056                                  @JsonProperty("fee")                  Coin        fee,
057                                  @JsonProperty("confirmations")        int         confirmations,
058                                  @JsonProperty("generated")            boolean     generated,
059                                  @JsonProperty("trusted")              boolean     trusted,
060                                  @JsonProperty("blockhash")            Sha256Hash  blockHash,
061                                  @JsonProperty("blockheight")          int         blockHeight,
062                                  @JsonProperty("blockindex")           int         blockIndex,
063                                  @JsonProperty("blockTime")            long        blockTime,
064                                  @JsonProperty("txid")                 Sha256Hash  txId,
065                                  @JsonProperty("walletconflicts")      List<Sha256Hash> walletConflicts,
066                                  @JsonProperty("time")                 long        time,
067                                  @JsonProperty("timereceived")         long        timeReceived,
068                                  @JsonProperty("comment")              String      comment,
069                                  @JsonProperty("bip125-replaceable")   String      bip125Replaceable,
070                                  @JsonProperty("abandoned")            boolean     abandoned)
071    {
072        this.involvesWatchOnly = involvesWatchOnly;
073        this.address = address;
074        this.category = category;
075        this.amount = amount;
076        this.label = label;
077        this.vout = vout;
078        this.fee = fee;
079        this.confirmations = confirmations;
080        this.generated = generated;
081        this.trusted = trusted;
082        this.blockHash = blockHash;
083        this.blockHeight = blockHeight;
084        this.blockIndex = blockIndex;
085        this.blockTime = Instant.ofEpochSecond(blockTime);
086        this.txId = txId;
087        this.walletConflicts = walletConflicts;
088        this.time = Instant.ofEpochSecond(time);
089        this.timeReceived = Instant.ofEpochSecond(timeReceived);
090        this.comment = comment;
091        this.bip125Replaceable = bip125Replaceable;
092        this.abandoned = abandoned;
093        this.otherInfo = new HashMap<>();
094    }
095
096    @JsonAnySetter
097    public void addOtherInfo(String propertyKey, Object value) {
098        this.otherInfo.put(propertyKey, value);
099    }
100
101    @JsonAnyGetter
102    public Map<String, Object> getOtherInfo() {
103        return otherInfo;
104    }
105
106    public boolean isInvolvesWatchOnly() {
107        return involvesWatchOnly;
108    }
109
110    public Address getAddress() {
111        return address;
112    }
113
114    public String getCategory() {
115        return category;
116    }
117
118    public Coin getAmount() {
119        return amount;
120    }
121
122    public String getLabel() {
123        return (label != null) ? label.replace("\n", "") : null;
124    }
125
126    public int getVout() {
127        return vout;
128    }
129
130    public Coin getFee() {
131        return fee;
132    }
133
134    public int getConfirmations() {
135        return confirmations;
136    }
137
138    public boolean isGenerated() {
139        return generated;
140    }
141
142    public boolean isTrusted() {
143        return trusted;
144    }
145
146    public Sha256Hash getBlockHash() {
147        return blockHash;
148    }
149
150    public int getBlockHeight() {
151        return blockHeight;
152    }
153
154    public int getBlockIndex() {
155        return blockIndex;
156    }
157
158    public Instant getBlockTime() {
159        return blockTime;
160    }
161
162    public Sha256Hash getTxId() {
163        return txId;
164    }
165
166    public List<Sha256Hash> getWalletConflicts() {
167        return walletConflicts;
168    }
169
170    public Instant getTime() {
171        return time;
172    }
173
174    public Instant getTimeReceived() {
175        return timeReceived;
176    }
177
178    public Optional<String> getComment() {
179        return Optional.ofNullable(comment);
180    }
181
182    public String isBip125Replaceable() {
183        return bip125Replaceable;
184    }
185
186    public boolean isAbandoned() {
187        return abandoned;
188    }
189}
